name: emojidrop
description:
Hello its me the emoji please help me get off this huge hill without falling off or hitting anything in the way.Collect special perks to do more in the game{they are everywhere}.Try looking for red markers to jump higher.

SCREEN SIZE = 

ONETOUCH  GAME{VERY ADDICTIVE}

Hey its me the developer mike and I have been working on this project it will be very awesome of you if you can share some love why donating or sharing or even both will be awesome.Money will go forwards to the development of the game as I  really want the game to come out for mobile.

THANK YOU
